name: Adrian Wedd - Professional CV
description: Seasoned Systems Analyst and Technology Professional with over 7 years transforming critical government housing systems in Tasmania. As of 2025, I continue bridging the gap between technical innovation and social impact, specializing in systems integration, cybersecurity, and pioneering AI adoption in the public sector. My diverse career path spans environmental advocacy, digital marketing, and government service - bringing a unique perspective that combines technical depth with values-driven problem-solving. I excel at translating complex technical concepts into actionable solutions that improve service delivery for vulnerable communities.
